https://tmrev.io/movie/271562-Dirty Energy 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/jMiC4XjhXwg71nCErRUWsG7WTs7.jpg This documentary tells the personal story of those directly affected by the Deepwater Horizon spill of 2010, who are now struggling to rebuild their lives amidst the economic devastation and long-term health risks. Dirty Energy
